Title: Lost to the Flame
Description:
The Druids of the Flame pose more of a threat than I realized. Not only do they let Fyrakk and his forces pour into the Dream, but they also tempt the Dream's denizens to the flame!

We cannot dwell on how this happened. It pains me greatly, but Elder Cassaphine must be stopped. 

Go with Tyrande and... end the dryad.
ObjectivesText: Defeat Elder Cassaphine at the base of Amirdrassil.
PortraitGiverText: The elder dryad has given her heart to the flame.
